comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: 1934, when it was built? The windows are left open to help the paint dry! Now known as Macarthur Girls High School. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Macarthur_Girls_High_School "Counted amongst "The Old Girls" is the Olympic gold medal winning runner Betty Cuthbert, reknowned actress, Nicole Kidman Finance Minister and Penny Wong." Compare with acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemDetailPaged.aspx?itemID=8701# which has a path, plantings along the front, and closed windows. [memo to photographers - close windows before photographing]

comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: Similiar damage appears on the other photos in the series - [SRNSW: 4346_a020_a020000296 & 4346_a020_a020000297]

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] I hadn't noticed the open windows until you metioned it. I see a couple of heads poking out one of the windows that [http://www.flickr.com/photos/pellethepoet] added above. 

Thanks for the info about the name change of the school; we've updated our captions here and on Photo Investigator.

AB

comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/27331537@N06] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/32162360@N00] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/47201412@N02] We have a similarly uninspiring edifice at  Manly - sans the portico - it replaced a beautiful sandstone school building that dated back to 1882.  State Records hasn't an easily accessible shot of the original (ie 1882) Manly Village School do you?

comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/johncowper] see Manly Local Studies Image Library website: Manly Public School, Darley Road, c. 1900 - www.photosau.com.au/Manly/scripts/ExtSearch.asp?SearchTer... Demolition of the 1882 building at Manly Public School - www.photosau.com.au/Manly/scripts/ExtSearch.asp?SearchTer... Arch from Manly Public School just before being demolished - www.photosau.com.au/Manly/scripts/ExtSearch.asp?SearchTer...

comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/47201412@N02] Thanks for these ... it will be interesting to see what State Records has, if anything!

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/johncowper] We don't have any digitised photos of Manly PS in Photo Investigator but "Manly Public School" is in the item list for this record series: *NRS 15051: Photographic collection* See Archives Investigator -> Advanced Search -> Record series -> Series Number =15051 The description of the series is: "The History Unit of the Dept of School Education collected these photographs when preparing school histories, research for public relations, or giving presentations. The collection consists mainly of photographic prints. Most show school buildings, pupils, teachers, or educational activities, with most including an identifying caption and date." AB

comment.author: 8234140@N05
comment._content: Good old Wikipedia! Can't believe everything you read there. Nicole Kidman grew up on Sydney's north shore and attended North Sydney Girls High. Penny Wong did all her Australian schooling in Adelaide.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/8234140@N05] Ha! I should not have quoted that juicy tit-bit from Wikipedia - it did seem like a delightfully unlikely weird threesome, and badly written and spelled.  Never believe anything you read on Flickr!
